featured.text: Many weight-conscious people also mistakenly believe that changing our bodies will fix everything.
While offering budget-conscious travelers a unique option, capsule hotels may not be suitable for everyone.
Health-conscious Americans are adding tofu, the most popular soybean product, to salads and using it as a meat substitute.

definition.zh_def: 意識到的，清醒的，對周圍環境有認知的。
definition.en_def: Aware of and able to think about one's own existence, sensations, thoughts, and surroundings.
definition.example: She was conscious of the fact that everyone was watching her.
